author: protolambda
content: A little late, but finally here: I update ZRNT and ZCLI to v0.10.1, passing all test vecs, and using Herumi BLS.

author: protolambda

author: protolambda
content: Anyway, just updated ZRNT to v0.11.0 (other branch, not in master yet). No slow release again, haha. Will check the correctness of the test-vectors with ZRNT for you all, as more internals and tests were refactored/changed in v0.11.0. No big update spec-wise though, about 1-2 hours of going through beacon-spec diff.

content:
